examples.title: Lightbeam
examples.description:
I enjoy searching for light beams. These are places where sunlight is partially blocked by concrete and steel, but some rays still manage to break through. When I spot a one, I pause and take my time. I get my camera settings ready and I wait. I patiently wait for someone to pass through the beam so I can capture the right image.

“Light Beam” is a photography
project by Anton Repponen

All photos by ©️ Anton Repponen
taken between 2014-2023

repponen.com

New York, 2023

examples.description: I'm a Creative Art Director with more than 14 years of experience, I worked in some of the main agencies in Brazil, such as Publicis, Leo Burnett, Ogilvy, NBS and now DPZ&T (Publicis Groupe). I have developed campaigns for clients such as Coca-Cola, McDonald's, Unilever, Kraft Foods, Burger King, P&G, BASF, General Motors, Fiat, MINI, Netflix, Itaú Bank and other brands. In recent years, my work has been recognized and rewarded by Cannes Lions, One Show, Clio, D&AD, London Festival, El Ojo, NY Festival, Effie Awards, Smarties, Wave, CCSP and more. Oh, and I also have Brazilian and Portuguese citizenship, and play drums in my spare time.
